price: Quando teu Senhor disse aos anjos: "Por certo, vou criar de barro um homem"
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّي خَٰلِقُۢ بَشَرٗا مِّن طِينٖ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla rabbuka lil'malāikati innī khāliqun basharan min ṭīnin
